title: Enabler: Mapping parameters OFI, RCS, Combridge, DTA
description:
Description
The existing APIs are to be used for SD LAN/WiFi. It is necessary to map the parameters required to operate the respective APIs for SD LAN/WiFi, to identify deltas and to adapt these deltas. This way, the APIs can also be used for SD LAN/WiFi.
  Required Inputs:
Parameters from the Early Site Enrichment: OFI, RCS, DTA and Combridge - until 09.09.
BOM (Bill of Material) - until 09.09.
Process Description: Early Site Enrichment - until 09.09.
